label: ExperienceProduct
comment: Any service that provides an involvement, such as an adventure experience, wellness experience, social or business activity experience.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the type of quantity unit applicable for this experience product.
A brand name, expressed as text, for this experience product.
A code specifying a category for this cross-border regulatory procedure, such as the appendices of the CITES Convention.
The indication of whether or not a certified person arrangement is made for this experience product.
An indemnity clause, expressed as text, for this experience event.
An instruction, expressed as text, for this experience event.
A location, expressed as text, for this MDH sanitary measure.
An objective, expressed as text, for this experience product.
The indication of whether or not this experience product requires a reservation guarantee.
A reservation guarantee, expressed as text, for this experience event.
A theme, expressed as text, for this experience product.
The code specifying the type of theme for this experience product.

objectProperties.comment: A specified textual or coded description, such as a remark or additional information.
A sum of money for which something is or may be bought or sold for trade purposes.
A distinctive or characteristic part of something.
An event included within this experience product.
An optional product for this experience product.
A document issued by a government, public organization or association to certify a property of a person, entity, process or object.
Common conditions contained in a contract or agreement applicable between trading partners.
The particular state of something, affected by use, that should be respected.

referencedBy.comment: An available product for this specified experience item.
An optional product for this experience product.
